lines.text: (panting) It grabs its staff and you can see it beginning to cast another incantation through its fingers in the staff, and then (plopping) (grunting) Flopping around on the floor.

So just, you know, know that we're your friends and that we're not going to hurt you, and that please don't hurt us, and don't scream or anything, and I think you're bald head looks really cool, and you should keep going with that because you look really nice and stuff, okay.

lines.text: Maybe we can convince one more to come with us, but they are hesitant to abandon the fort.

lines.text: I'm going to heal everybody really quickly, so I'm going to do a--

lines.text: You're not wrong, you're not wrong.

lines.text: We're also taking a short rest, yeah?

lines.text: Yeah, but we want them to talk.
